title: 125- The Best Defence is a Good Defence
description: Over the course of his reign Diocletian instituted a number of reforms to the military structure that helped transform the legions into a new kind of army.
content:encoded: Over the course of his reign Diocletian instituted a number of reforms to the military structure that helped transform the legions into a new kind of army.
